participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Friendly and hardworking, always eager to lend a hand. Loves animals and enjoys discussing construction techniques.
participant_1.background: i'm a construction worker. my cats are very special to me. i've 5 cats. i enjoy building houses.

participant_2.background: my friends are all skateboarders. i've a broken arm. i am a skateboarder. my favourite skater is rob dryden.
